# TEST

curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/auth/realms/my_realm/protocol/openid-connect/token" ^
--header "Content-Typ: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" ^
--data-urlencode "grant_type=password" ^
--data-urlencode "client_id=my_client" ^
--data-urlencode "client_secret=f65f2b24-83dc-4f75-8e18-0b45f51b7564" ^
--data-urlencode "username=admin" ^
--data-urlencode "password=1" | jq

curl -X GET "http://localhost:8000/test/authenticated" ^
--header "Authorization: bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICJlM0VZNTBhenp5TUZhaXhtTEVxR3ozdFdPM1pUYWlNR2E1TmxiVW8tQkdVIn0..NQWEdoovIu-hcb1vDRB3jXpuTt64bVTYh6CM63JuYdxjJn9ptUhtvhSjqNBPBY7n3FvvN1Y8BC_oumBwWjVhYbM4kwjLDpyTxYJ6jaugBmzoJQkmxVdV7yY8dQyq48_7C0WgfDRqBaBT_uOdyfKMIiltwbyav1B5Xn7cqz7Bx6H5mGtGcXH8Cj2U3x6WDMx80u1DLiRL_wWAHExebSTzmaEUedXqiChlwAHPuucBmzdE3PcB_VY8WAgAx8siTZolmvF5L8Tl28AKqB2x778Oo0mpA4ZtAhyoN2ztNHGZRZDKa3FPH6JkzpkgR8sdh0BZJgeIA7XpDKDNgX8iU7a21Q"
